ygData.subject: Re: The benefits of being Techno-organic
ygData.msgSnippet: Inferno paused for a moment as he considered this.  He reluctently lowered his gun and put it back in it s holster. Very well.  But I insist on being present

Inferno paused for a moment as he considered this.  He reluctently 
lowered his gun and put it back in it's holster.
"Very well.  But I insist on being present during his repairs."   
The ant bot said firmly.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> Azure: Do you not see, Inferno? We are not here to take Hydras out,
> merely to repair him...
> 
> He had not yet put the grenades back in place, not certain of the
> soldier's reaction.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Trooper's leader:
> > 
> > "Her commands was get all found bots that we can, and sent them 
to Base"
> >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> >   From: CatMaster o 
> >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> >   Sent: Friday, July 22, 2005 2:08 PM
> >   Subject: Re: The benefits of being Techno-organic
> > 
> > 
> >   "What does your colony's queen want with my Queen?" Inferno 
insisted
> >   turning his head to the troops's leader.
